item.description: Hi there, I’m gwself! 👋 Welcome to my GitHub profile! I’m passionate about gwself. Here are some of the projects I’m currently working on: Projects small-rpc 🔥基于netty和hessian的一个轻量级RPC调用框架 simple-seata Forked from archbobo/simple-seata 简化版seata，seata是阿里开源的分布式事务框架 small-spring Forked from fuzhengwei/small-spring 🌱《 Spring 手撸专栏》，本专栏以 Spring 源码学习为目的，通过手写简化版 Spring 框架，了解 Spring 核心原理。在手写的过程中会简化 Spring 源码，摘取整体框架中的核心逻辑，简化代码实现过程，保留核心功能，例如：IOC、AOP、Bean生命周期、上下文、作用域、资源处理等内容实现。 tiny-spring Forked from code4craft/tiny-spring A tiny IoC container refer to Spring. 📈 GitHub Stats Thanks for stopping by! 😊
